title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, and then accessing the context menu and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option, nothing happens. The action should add the Javadoc to the selected field, but currently, it does nothing.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu of the Type Hierarchy view should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 
2. Select a field in the view and access the context menu. 
3. Choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the menu.
